error_text.message:
Data loading failed.
Please reload this extension for recovery.

link_config.message: If you want to watch broadcasting at optional page, a link to the page will be displayed with a group if you have configured the URL.

broadcasting_existed.message: This broadcasting has been already added.

ustream_search_error.message: An Error occurred during get broadcasting data

twitch_not_avaiable.message: This channel is unavaiable on twtich

menu_failed_save_group.message: Saving group was failed. please retry creating group

option_enable_menu.message: enable context menu for watching page add to group

option_help_first_launch_description.message:
Live Streaming Checker hold any broadcastings as group and if broadcasting any one in group became live, do notify to desktop.
When this extension was launched at first, this extension has no group. let's click "Add" button to add group.

option_help_add_from_ustream_description.message: if you add broadcasting on USTREAM, please search with channel name that is displayed in location bar on USTREAM watching page.

option_help_add_from_twitch_description.message: if you add broadcasting on Twitch, please search with channel name that is displayed in location bar on Twitch watching page.

option_help_add_from_nico.message: Case: add broadcasting on Nico Live

option_help_add_from_nico_description.message: if you add broadcasting on Nico Live, please search with Community Number that is displayed in location bar on community page.

option_help_add_from_stickam_description.message: if you add broadcasting on Stickam, please search with user name that is displayed in location bar on profile page.

option_help_add_from_twitcasting_descrip.message: if you add broadcasting on Twitcasting, please search with user name that is displayed in location bar on Twitcasting watching page.

option_help_add_from_fc2.message: Case: add broadcasting on FC2 Live

option_help_add_from_fc2_description.message: if you add broadcasting on FC2 Live, please search with stream id that is displayed in location bar on FC2 Live watching page.

option_help_create_group_description.message:
Let's create group in page that was opened by "Add" button.
"Group Name" is required for group. You can add broadcasting more than 1 to group.
if broadcasting that was added in group became live, this extension do notify that to desktop.
You can do searching and adding broadcasting from search form.

option_help_icon_description.message:
You can set icon for group.
if group has single broadcasting, set automatically that broadcasting's icon
if group has any broadcastings, you can change group icon by clicking other broadcasting's icon

option_help_link_description.message:
If you want to jump optional page easily when group became to live, you can configure optional page url in "Link" config tab.
If this config was configured, you can jump easily from link in group list.

option_context_menu_description.message:
You can add broadcasting to group in menu on watching page.
Click "Add broadcasting to group" to add broadcasting as new group or select group to add broadcasting as existing group's in menu.

option_about_description.message:

Please send feedback through Twitter or E-Mail(bonono.jp@gmail.com) if you want to do that.
